title: How to score 80+ in maths class 10 - Quora

response.answer_text: My suggestion will be little bit different from others. Plz follow others valuable answers in the subject to improve subject knowledge. Then follow below suggestion: Everyday visualize yourself that you already got your preferred marks. Not only 80 more than that. Sit aside in your home without any disturbance. Close your eyes. Visualize yourself as you practiced excellent the subject. Visualize yourself as you are in exam hall with the question paper in your hand and you are very happy as you know all answers. You have done 100Marks with confidence. You are feeling very happy. You imagine that you got that marks you preferred. See your parents and teachers appreciation in imagination. You can practice this to all examinations. It's a proven theory. Wishing you all the best.

see its a fact that there are majority of math phobia suffering students who want to score well for that as others have suggested u ma score well applying those . but i would suggest a very important thing on the basis of my experience. first thing is that ur concepts must be crystal clear. next thing you must just be very good in theoram and postulates and then comes the last one which is practice when you practice with all your concepts clear and remembering your theorams and postulates your half problem is just solved and now as u go on solving more and more questions u’ll get to know where u r weak and where u need to focus more. the last thing i would like to tell is try studying smarter instead of studying harder. and all the best.
